Sentencas: This paper compares the performance characteristics of a combined power system with solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and gas turbine (GT) working under two thermodynamic optimization strategies.
Titulo: Comparison between two optimization strategies for solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid cycles

Sentencas: Expressions of the optimized power output and efficiency for both the subsystems and the SOFC-GT hybrid cycle are derived.
Titulo: Comparison between two optimization strategies for solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid cycles

Sentencas: Optimal performance characteristics are discussed and compared in detail through a parametric analysis to evaluate the impact of multi-irreversibilities that take into account on the system behaviour.
Titulo: Comparison between two optimization strategies for solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid cycles

Sentencas: It is found that there exist certain new optimum criteria for some important design and operating parameters.
Titulo: Comparison between two optimization strategies for solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid cycles

Sentencas: Engineers should find the methodologies developed in this paper useful in the optimal design and practical operation of complex hybrid fuel cell power plants.
Titulo: Comparison between two optimization strategies for solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid cycles
